What I Teach

Find Your Sound

Whether you're 7 or 70, I'll meet you where you are and get you making music.

ðŸŽ¸

Guitar Lessons

Acoustic and electric guitar for beginners through intermediate players. Learn chords, strumming patterns, fingerpicking, and how to play your favorite songs. All ages welcome, kids 7 and up.

ðŸŽ¤

Voice Lessons

Develop your singing voice with proper technique, breath control, and performance confidence. Whether you want to sing along while you play or take the stage, I'll help you find your voice.

ðŸª•

Ukulele Lessons

The ukulele is the perfect starter instrument â€” easy to hold, fun to play, and you'll be strumming songs within your first lesson. Great for younger students and beginners of all ages.
